00043     // __quatGT conversions
00044 
00045         template <typename T> 
00046         inline _xquat<T>::_xquat(const T pitch, const T yaw, const T roll)
00047         {
00048                 _xvec3<T> eulerAngle(pitch * 0.5f, yaw * 0.5f, roll * 0.5f);
00049                 _xvec3<T> c = glm::cos(eulerAngle * 0.5f);
00050                 _xvec3<T> s = glm::sin(eulerAngle * 0.5f);
00051                 
00052                 this->w = c.x * c.y * c.z + s.x * s.y * s.z;
00053                 this->x = s.x * c.y * c.z - c.x * s.y * s.z;
00054                 this->y = c.x * s.y * c.z + s.x * c.y * s.z;
00055                 this->z = c.x * c.y * s.z - s.x * s.y * c.z;
00056         }
00057 
00058         template <typename T> 
00059         inline _xquat<T>::_xquat(const _xvec3<T>& eulerAngle)
00060         {
00061                 _xvec3<T> c = glm::cos(eulerAngle * 0.5f);
00062                 _xvec3<T> s = glm::sin(eulerAngle * 0.5f);
00063                 
00064                 this->w = c.x * c.y * c.z + s.x * s.y * s.z;
00065                 this->x = s.x * c.y * c.z - c.x * s.y * s.z;
00066                 this->y = c.x * s.y * c.z + s.x * c.y * s.z;
00067                 this->z = c.x * c.y * s.z - s.x * s.y * c.z;            
00068         }

00080     template <typename T> 
00081     inline _xquat<T>::_xquat(const _xmat3<T>& m)
00082     {
00083         T fourXSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] - m[1][1] - m[2][2];
00084         T fourYSquaredMinus1 = m[1][1] - m[0][0] - m[2][2];
00085         T fourZSquaredMinus1 = m[2][2] - m[0][0] - m[1][1];
00086         T fourWSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] + m[1][1] + m[2][2];
00087         
00088         int biggestIndex = 0;
00089         T fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourWSquaredMinus1;
00090         if(fourXSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00091         {
00092             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourXSquaredMinus1;
00093             biggestIndex = 1;
00094         }
00095         if(fourYSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00096         {
00097             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourYSquaredMinus1;
00098             biggestIndex = 2;
00099         }
00100         if(fourZSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00101         {
00102             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourZSquaredMinus1;
00103             biggestIndex = 3;
00104         }
00105 
00106         T biggestVal = glm::sqrt(fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 + 1) * 0.5f;
00107         T mult = 0.25f / biggestVal;
00108 
00109         switch(biggestIndex)
00110         {
00111         case 0:
00112             this->x = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00113             this->y = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00114             this->z = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00115             this->w = biggestVal;
00116             break;
00117         case 1:
00118             this->x = biggestVal;
00119             this->y = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00120             this->z = (m[2][1] + m[1][2]) * mult;
00121             this->w = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00122             break;
00123         case 2:
00124             this->x = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00125             this->y = biggestVal;
00126             this->z = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00127             this->w = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00128             break;
00129         case 3:
00130             this->x = (m[2][0] + m[0][2]) * mult;
00131             this->y = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00132             this->z = biggestVal;
00133             this->w = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00134             break;
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138     template <typename T> 
00139     inline _xquat<T>::_xquat(const _xmat4<T>& m)
00140     {
00141         T fourXSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] - m[1][1] - m[2][2];
00142         T fourYSquaredMinus1 = m[1][1] - m[0][0] - m[2][2];
00143         T fourZSquaredMinus1 = m[2][2] - m[0][0] - m[1][1];
00144         T fourWSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] + m[1][1] + m[2][2];
00145         
00146         int biggestIndex = 0;
00147         T fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourWSquaredMinus1;
00148         if(fourXSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00149         {
00150             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourXSquaredMinus1;
00151             biggestIndex = 1;
00152         }
00153         if(fourYSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00154         {
00155             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourYSquaredMinus1;
00156             biggestIndex = 2;
00157         }
00158         if(fourZSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00159         {
00160             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourZSquaredMinus1;
00161             biggestIndex = 3;
00162         }
00163 
00164         T biggestVal = glm::sqrt(fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 + 1) * 0.5f;
00165         T mult = 0.25f / biggestVal;
00166 
00167         switch(biggestIndex)
00168         {
00169         case 0:
00170             this->x = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00171             this->y = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00172             this->z = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00173             this->w = biggestVal;
00174             break;
00175         case 1:
00176             this->x = biggestVal;
00177             this->y = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00178             this->z = (m[2][1] + m[1][2]) * mult;
00179             this->w = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00180             break;
00181         case 2:
00182             this->x = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00183             this->y = biggestVal;
00184             this->z = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00185             this->w = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00186             break;
00187         case 3:
00188             this->x = (m[2][0] + m[0][2]) * mult;
00189             this->y = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00190             this->z = biggestVal;
00191             this->w = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00192             break;
00193         }
00194     }

00364     // Transformation
00365     template <typename T>
00366     inline _xvec3<T> _xquat<T>::operator* (const _xvec3<T>& v) const
00367     {
00368         _xvec3<T> uv, uuv;
00369             _xvec3<T> QuatVector(x, y, z);
00370         uv = cross(QuatVector, v);
00371         uuv = cross(QuatVector, uv);
00372             uv *= (2.0f * w); 
00373             uuv *= 2.0f; 
00374 
00375             return v + uv + uuv;
00376     }
00377 
00378     template <typename T>
00379     inline _xvec4<T> _xquat<T>::operator* (const _xvec4<T>& v) const
00380     {
00381         _xvec3<T> uv, uuv;
00382             _xvec3<T> QuatVector(x, y, z);
00383         uv = glm::cross(QuatVector, _xvec3<T>(v));
00384         uuv = glm::cross(QuatVector, uv);
00385             uv *= (2.0f * w); 
00386             uuv *= 2.0f; 
00387 
00388             return _xvec4<T>(v + uv + uuv, v.w);
00389     }
00390 
00392     template <typename T> 
00393     inline float length(const _xquat<T> & q)
00394     {
00395         return static_cast<T>(glm::sqrt(
00396             q.x * q.x + 
00397             q.y * q.y + 
00398             q.z * q.z + 
00399             q.w * q.w));
00400     }
00401 
00402     template <typename T> 
00403     inline _xquat<T> normalize(const _xquat<T>& q)
00404     {
00405         T len = static_cast<T>(glm::length(q));
00406         if(len <= 0) // Problem
00407             return glm::_xquat<T>(1, 0, 0, 0);
00408         T oneOverLen = 1 / len;
00409         return glm::_xquat<T>(q.w * oneOverLen, q.x * oneOverLen, q.y * oneOverLen, q.z * oneOverLen);
00410     }
00411 
00412     template <typename T> 
00413     inline T dot(const glm::_xquat<T> & q1, const glm::_xquat<T> & q2)
00414     {
00415         return q1.x * q2.x + q1.y * q2.y + q1.z * q2.z + q1.w * q2.w;
00416     }
00417 
00418     template <typename T> 
00419     inline _xquat<T> cross(const _xquat<T>& q1, const _xquat<T>& q2)
00420     {
00421         return _xquat<T>(
00422             q1.w * q2.w - q1.x * q2.x - q1.y * q2.y - q1.z * q2.z,
00423                 q1.w * q2.x + q1.x * q2.w + q1.y * q2.z - q1.z * q2.y,
00424                 q1.w * q2.y + q1.y * q2.w + q1.z * q2.x - q1.x * q2.z,
00425                 q1.w * q2.z + q1.z * q2.w + q1.x * q2.y - q1.y * q2.x);
00426     }
00427     /*
00428     template <typename T> 
00429     inline glm::_xquat<T> glm::cross(const glm::_xquat<T> & q, const glm::_xvec3<T> & v)
00430     {
00431         return glm::_xquat<T>(
00432             (q.w * v.x) + (q.y * v.z) - (q.z * v.y),
00433             (q.w * v.y) + (q.z * v.x) - (q.x * v.z),
00434             (q.w * v.z) + (q.x * v.y) - (q.y * v.x),
00435         -(q.x * v.x) - (q.y * v.y) - (q.z * v.z));
00436     }
00437     */
00438     /*
00439     template <typename T> 
00440     inline glm::_xquat<T> glm::cross(const glm::_xvec3<T> & v, const glm::_xquat<T> & q)
00441     {
00442 
00443     }
00444     */
00445     template <typename T>
00446     inline _xquat<T> mix(const _xquat<T>& x, const _xquat<T>& y, float a)
00447     {
00448         if(a <= 0) return x;
00449         if(a >= 1) return y;
00450 
00451         float fCos = glm::dot(x, y);
00452         glm::_xquat<T> y2(y); //BUG!!! glm::_xquat<T> y2;
00453         if(fCos < 0.0f)
00454         {
00455             y2 = -y;
00456             fCos = -fCos;
00457         }
00458 
00459         //if(fCos > 1.0f) // problem
00460         float k0, k1;
00461         if(fCos > 0.9999f)
00462         {
00463             k0 = 1.0f - a;
00464             k1 = 0.0f + a; //BUG!!! 1.0f + a;
00465         }
00466         else
00467         {
00468             float fSin = glm::sqrt(1.0f - fCos * fCos);
00469             float fAngle = glm::atan(fSin, fCos);
00470             float fOneOverSin = 1.0f / fSin;
00471             k0 = glm::sin((1.0f - a) * fAngle) * fOneOverSin;
00472             k1 = glm::sin((0.0f + a) * fAngle) * fOneOverSin;
00473         }
00474 
00475         return glm::_xquat<T>(
00476             k0 * x.w + k1 * y2.w,
00477             k0 * x.x + k1 * y2.x,
00478             k0 * x.y + k1 * y2.y,
00479             k0 * x.z + k1 * y2.z);
00480     }
00481 
00482     template <typename T> 
00483     inline _xquat<T> pow(const _xquat<T>& x, T y)
00484     {
00485         if(glm::abs(x.w) > 0.9999f)
00486             return x;
00487         float Angle = glm::acos(y);
00488         float NewAngle = Angle * y;
00489         float Div = glm::sin(NewAngle) / glm::sin(Angle);
00490         return glm::_xquat<T>(
00491             glm::cos(NewAngle),
00492             x.x * Div,
00493             x.y * Div,
00494             x.z * Div);
00495     }
00496 
00497     template <typename T> 
00498     inline _xquat<T> conjugateGTX(const _xquat<T>& q)
00499     {
00500         return _xquat<T>(q.w, -q.x, -q.y, -q.z);
00501     }
00502 
00503     template <typename T> 
00504     inline _xquat<T> inverseGTX(const _xquat<T>& q)
00505     {
00506         return conjugateGTX(q) / length(q);
00507     }
00508 
00509     template <typename T> 
00510     inline _xquat<T> rotateGTX(const _xquat<T>& q, float angle, float x, float y, float z)
00511     {
00512         // Axis of rotation must be normalised
00513         float len = glm::length(glm::_xvec3<T>(x, y, z));
00514         if(glm::abs(len - 1.0f) > 0.001f)
00515         {
00516             float oneOverLen = 1 / len;
00517             x *= oneOverLen;
00518             y *= oneOverLen;
00519             z *= oneOverLen;
00520         }
00521 
00522         angle = glm::radians(angle);
00523         float fSin = glm::sin(angle * 0.5f);
00524 
00525         return glm::_xquat<T>(glm::cos(angle * 0.5f), x * fSin, y * fSin, z * fSin);
00526     }
00527 
00528     template <typename T> 
00529     inline _xvec3<T> rotateGTX(const _xquat<T>& q, const _xvec3<T>& v)
00530     {
00531         _xquat<T> Result = q * v * inverseGTX(q);
00532         return _xvec3<T>(Result.x, Result.y, Result.z);
00533     }
00534 
00535     template <typename T> 
00536     inline _xvec4<T> rotateGTX(const _xquat<T>& q, const _xvec4<T>& v)
00537     {
00538         _xquat<T> Result = q * v * inverseGTX(q);
00539         return _xvec4<T>(v.w, Result.x, Result.y, Result.z);
00540     }
00541 
00542     template <typename T> 
00543     inline float angleGTX(const _xquat<T>& x)
00544     {
00545         return glm::cos(x.w) * 2.0f;
00546     }
00547 
00548     template <typename T> 
00549     inline _xvec3<T> axisGTX(const _xquat<T>& x)
00550     {
00551         T tmp1 = 1 - x.w * x.w;
00552         if(tmp1 <= 0.0f)
00553             return glm::_xvec3<T>(0, 0, 1);
00554         T tmp2 = 1 / glm::sqrt(tmp1);
00555         return glm::_xvec3<T>(x.x * tmp2, x.y * tmp2, x.z * tmp2);
00556     }
00557 
00558     template <typename T> 
00559     inline _xmat3<T> mat3GTX(const _xquat<T>& q)
00560     {
00561         _xmat3<T> Result(1);
00562         Result[0][0] = 1 - 2 * q.y * q.y - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00563         Result[0][1] = 2 * q.x * q.y + 2 * q.w * q.z;
00564         Result[0][2] = 2 * q.x * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.y;
00565 
00566         Result[1][0] = 2 * q.x * q.y - 2 * q.w * q.z;
00567         Result[1][1] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00568         Result[1][2] = 2 * q.y * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.x;
00569 
00570         Result[2][0] = 2 * q.x * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.y;
00571         Result[2][1] = 2 * q.y * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.x;
00572         Result[2][2] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.y * q.y;
00573         return Result;
00574     }
00575 
00576     template <typename T> 
00577     inline _xmat4<T> mat4GTX(const _xquat<T>& q)
00578     {
00579         _xmat4<T> Result = _xmat4<T>(1);
00580         Result[0][0] = 1 - 2 * q.y * q.y - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00581         Result[0][1] = 2 * q.x * q.y + 2 * q.w * q.z;
00582         Result[0][2] = 2 * q.x * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.y;
00583 
00584         Result[1][0] = 2 * q.x * q.y - 2 * q.w * q.z;
00585         Result[1][1] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00586         Result[1][2] = 2 * q.y * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.x;
00587 
00588         Result[2][0] = 2 * q.x * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.y;
00589         Result[2][1] = 2 * q.y * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.x;
00590         Result[2][2] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.y * q.y;
00591         return Result;
00592     }
00593 
00594     template <typename T> 
00595     inline _xquat<T> quatGTX(const _xmat3<T>& m)
00596     {
00597         T fourXSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] - m[1][1] - m[2][2];
00598         T fourYSquaredMinus1 = m[1][1] - m[0][0] - m[2][2];
00599         T fourZSquaredMinus1 = m[2][2] - m[0][0] - m[1][1];
00600         T fourWSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] + m[1][1] + m[2][2];
00601         
00602         int biggestIndex = 0;
00603         T fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourWSquaredMinus1;
00604         if(fourXSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00605         {
00606             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourXSquaredMinus1;
00607             biggestIndex = 1;
00608         }
00609         if(fourYSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00610         {
00611             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourYSquaredMinus1;
00612             biggestIndex = 2;
00613         }
00614         if(fourZSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00615         {
00616             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourZSquaredMinus1;
00617             biggestIndex = 3;
00618         }
00619 
00620         T biggestVal = glm::sqrt(fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 + 1) * 0.5f;
00621         T mult = 0.25f / biggestVal;
00622 
00623         glm::_xquat<T> Result;
00624         switch(biggestIndex)
00625         {
00626         case 0:
00627             Result.w = biggestVal; 
00628             Result.x = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00629             Result.y = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00630             Result.z = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00631             break;
00632         case 1:
00633             Result.w = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00634             Result.x = biggestVal;
00635             Result.y = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00636             Result.z = (m[2][1] + m[1][2]) * mult;
00637             break;
00638         case 2:
00639             Result.w = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00640             Result.x = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00641             Result.y = biggestVal;
00642             Result.z = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00643             break;
00644         case 3:
00645             Result.w = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00646             Result.x = (m[2][0] + m[0][2]) * mult;
00647             Result.y = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00648             Result.z = biggestVal;
00649             break;
00650         }
00651         return Result;
00652     }
00653 
00654     template <typename T> 
00655     inline _xquat<T> quatGTX(const _xmat4<T>& m)
00656     {
00657         T fourWSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] + m[1][1] + m[2][2];
00658         T fourXSquaredMinus1 = m[0][0] - m[1][1] - m[2][2];
00659         T fourYSquaredMinus1 = m[1][1] - m[0][0] - m[2][2];
00660         T fourZSquaredMinus1 = m[2][2] - m[0][0] - m[1][1];
00661         
00662         int biggestIndex = 0;
00663         T fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourWSquaredMinus1;
00664         if(fourXSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00665         {
00666             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourXSquaredMinus1;
00667             biggestIndex = 1;
00668         }
00669         if(fourYSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00670         {
00671             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourYSquaredMinus1;
00672             biggestIndex = 2;
00673         }
00674         if(fourZSquaredMinus1 > fourBiggestSquaredMinus1)
00675         {
00676             fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 = fourZSquaredMinus1;
00677             biggestIndex = 3;
00678         }
00679 
00680         T biggestVal = glm::sqrt(fourBiggestSquaredMinus1 + 1) * 0.5f;
00681         T mult = 0.25f / biggestVal;
00682 
00683         glm::_xquat<T> Result;
00684         switch(biggestIndex)
00685         {
00686         case 0:
00687             Result.w = biggestVal;
00688             Result.x = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00689             Result.y = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00690             Result.z = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00691             break;
00692         case 1:
00693             Result.w = (m[1][2] - m[2][1]) * mult;
00694             Result.x = biggestVal;
00695             Result.y = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00696             Result.z = (m[2][1] + m[1][2]) * mult;
00697             break;
00698         case 2:
00699             Result.w = (m[2][0] - m[0][2]) * mult;
00700             Result.x = (m[0][1] + m[1][0]) * mult;
00701             Result.y = biggestVal;
00702             Result.z = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00703             break;
00704         case 3:
00705             Result.w = (m[0][1] - m[1][0]) * mult;
00706             Result.x = (m[2][0] + m[0][2]) * mult;
00707             Result.y = (m[1][2] + m[2][1]) * mult;
00708             Result.z = biggestVal;
00709             break;
00710         }
00711         return Result;
00712     }
00713 
00714     template <typename T> 
00715     inline _xquat<T> angleAxisGTX(float angle, float x, float y, float z)
00716     {
00717         _xquat<T> result;
00718         // Axis of rotation must be normalised
00719         float len = glm::length(glm::_xvec3<T>(x, y, z));
00720         if(glm::abs(len - 1.0f) > 0.001f)
00721         {
00722             float oneOverLen = 1 / len;
00723             x *= oneOverLen;
00724             y *= oneOverLen;
00725             z *= oneOverLen;
00726         }
00727 
00728         angle = glm::radians(angle);
00729         float fSin = glm::sin(angle * 0.5f);
00730 
00731         result.w = glm::cos(angle * 0.5f);
00732         result.x = x * fSin;
00733         result.y = y * fSin;
00734         result.z = z * fSin;
00735         return result;
00736     }
00737 
00738     template <typename T> 
00739     inline _xquat<T> angleAxisGTX(float angle, const _xvec3<T>& v)
00740     {
00741         glm::_xquat<T> result;
00742         glm::_xvec3<T> v_normalized = glm::normalize(v);
00743 
00744         angle = glm::radians(angle);
00745         float fSin = glm::sin(angle * 0.5f);
00746 
00747         result.w = glm::cos(angle * 0.5f);
00748         result.x = v.x * fSin;
00749         result.y = v.y * fSin;
00750         result.z = v.z * fSin;
00751         return result;
00752     }
00753 
00754     template <typename T> T extractRealComponentGTX(const _xquat<T>& q)
00755     {
00756         T w = T(1.0) - q.x * q.x - q.y * q.y - q.z * q.z;
00757         if(w < T(0.0))
00758             return T(0.0);
00759         else
00760             return -glm::sqrt(w);
00761     }
00762 }
